section.section:
The Department shall establish and administer an urban and community forestry program to provide State or federal financial assistance, on a matching basis, to:
A county or municipal corporation that implements a local urban and community forestry program within its jurisdiction; or
A nonprofit corporation that participates in the implementation of a local urban and community forestry program.
The county or municipal corporation may hire an individual to direct its program with the cooperation of the Department.
